title: 04/16/2021 - Hour 2 - Frank Isola
itunes:title: 04/16/2021 - Hour 2 - Frank Isola
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, debate whether Julian Edelman is worthy of the Hall of Fame. Frank Isola joins the show to discuss the Lakers getting healthy, the reasoning for Kevin Durant not to play back-to-back games, if there is a chance Kyrie Irving could miss any playoff games and more from around the NBA. Plus, the guys react to Michael Jordan being chosen to enshrine Kobe Bryant into the basketball hall of fame.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
